author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Following the issue reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/27657, the following files were said to be removed after the merging of #27175 in the master:
- EcalDeadChannelRecoveryNN class
- All the content of the ```RecoLocalCalo/EcalDeadChannelRecoveryAlgos/test``` directory

Further:
- Removed unneeded dependency and includes of EcalRecHit, as pointed out by the unit tests

#### PR validation:

It builds



@nancymarinelli @taroni
@crovelli @argiro @zghiche @fcouderc
title: Remove EcalDeadChannelRecoveryNN
